summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, indicating that Epstein is in New York on the specified date. The email contains a confidentiality notice and suggests that the communication may be privileged. It emphasizes the importance of confidentiality and the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, communicating his location to Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is communicating with Jes Staley, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on July 24, 2010.
Jeffrey Epstein states he is in New York on the date of the email.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email includes a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
